thread.title: You Negotiated a Great Deal. That Could Hurt Your Next One

author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: You Negotiated a Great Deal. That Could Hurt Your Next One
text:
Success often has a way of building upon itself. When it comes to negotiating deals, however, that isnâ€™t always the case.
A recent study published in the Journal of Applied Psychology found that when people engage in back-to-back negotiations with different counterparts, the residual glow of success from one negotiation can lead to a bad outcome in the next.
